Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to pre-recorded political messages
Summary: Relates to pre-recorded political messages; prohibits automatic dialing-announcing devices unless a live operator provides certain information in the first thirty seconds; requires registration; authorizes attorney general to investigate violations.
LawCode: Amd ยง399-p, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to pre-recorded political messages
